name: Gradient & Dark
description: Vibrant gradients on dark backgrounds, modern tech aesthetic

characteristics.colors: dark base with vibrant gradient accents
characteristics.typography: bold, often with gradient text effects

components.buttons: bg-gradient-to-r from-violet-500 to-pink-500 text-white rounded-lg px-6 py-3 font-semibold hover:opacity-90 transition-opacity
components.cards: bg-zinc-900 border border-zinc-800 rounded-2xl p-6 hover:border-zinc-700 transition-colors
components.badges: bg-gradient-to-r from-violet-500/20 to-pink-500/20 text-violet-300 text-sm font-medium px-3 py-1 rounded-full border border-violet-500/30

tailwindClasses.hero: min-h-screen bg-black flex items-center justify-center relative overflow-hidden
tailwindClasses.gradientText: bg-gradient-to-r from-violet-400 via-pink-400 to-cyan-400 bg-clip-text text-transparent
tailwindClasses.headline: text-5xl md:text-7xl font-extrabold tracking-tight
tailwindClasses.cta: bg-gradient-to-r from-violet-500 to-pink-500 text-white rounded-full px-8 py-4 text-lg font-semibold hover:shadow-lg hover:shadow-violet-500/25 transition-all
tailwindClasses.ctaSecondary: border border-zinc-700 text-white rounded-full px-8 py-4 text-lg hover:bg-zinc-900 hover:border-zinc-600
tailwindClasses.glowEffect: absolute w-96 h-96 bg-violet-500/30 rounded-full blur-3xl -z-10

doNot: Make text unreadable on dark bg
